right.text: dude, all I said was "what". don't be like Scrappy Doo or anything here

left.text: I said "Hi". Is their a problem with that? If their is, then, to put it bluntly, tough.

right.text: the question is why I literally said one word to you and you're already picking a fight :(

left.text: * Scorch3000 laughs his arse off. Well, why did you say what when all i said was hi?
